entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Oromocto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:22 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Becoming clear overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 7.
